p:
In addition, inflammatory factors that indicate the immune condition of patients, such as interleukins (IL) IL-2, IL-6, IL-7, and IL-10 and the tumoral necrosis factor-α (TNF-α) become elevated. Plasma levels of Granulocyte-colony stimulating factor (GCSF), protein induced by interferon gamma, Monocyte Chemoattractant Protein-1 (MCP-1), macrophages inflammatory protein 1α and TNF-α also display significant increase.
44
